articles.title: Behind Paramount’s Relentless Campaign to Woo Warner Discovery and President Trump - The Wall Street Journal
articles.description: David Ellison has launched a hostile takeover bid for Warner Discovery, taking his case directly to shareholders after Netflix clinched a deal

articles.title: PepsiCo to cut prices, eliminate products as part of a deal with an activist investor - AP News
articles.description: PepsiCo plans to cut prices and eliminate some of its products under a deal with an activist investor announced Monday. The Purchase, New York-based company, which makes Frito-Lay products as well as beverages, said it will cut nearly 20% of its product offer…

articles.title: Amazon robotaxi service Zoox to charge for rides in 2026, with ‘laser focus’ on transporting people - Fortune
articles.description: Jesse Levinson, Zoox cofounder and CTO, said the robotaxi service needs several more years before it’s “financially interesting.”

articles.title: Mortgage rates are surging ahead of the Fed’s expected rate cut. What gives? - MarketWatch
articles.description: Homeowners and buyers can still beat high rates with two specific moves

articles.title: China's trade surplus hits $1 trillion for first time ever - NPR
articles.description: China's exports to the U.S. have dropped sharply this year, in the face of President Trump's tariffs — but the country is still finding plenty of customers elsewhere around the world.

articles.title: IBM to acquire Confluent for $11B as it seeks to bolster its data offerings - TechCrunch
articles.description: IBM is buying data infrastructure company Confluent for $11 billion in cash in a bid to bolster its data and automation products as ever more companies move their tech operations to the cloud and deploy AI technology.
